00026 #ifndef NOISEJOBQUEUE_H
00027 #define NOISEJOBQUEUE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 namespace noisepp
00032 {
00033 namespace utils
00034 {
00035 
00037 class Job
00038 {
00039         public:
00041                 virtual ~Job () {}
00044                 virtual void execute () = 0;
00047                 virtual void finish () {}
00048 };
00049 
00052 class JobQueue
00053 {
00054         protected:
00056                 std::queue<Job*> mJobs;
00057 
00058         public:
00060                 virtual void addJob (Job *job);
00062                 virtual void executeJobs ();
00064                 virtual ~JobQueue ();
00065 };
00066 
00067 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_THREADS
00070 class ThreadedJobQueue : public JobQueue
00071 {
00072         private:
00074                 std::queue<Job*> mJobsDone;
00075 
00076                 threadpp::ThreadGroup mThreads;
00077                 threadpp::Mutex mMutex;
00078                 threadpp::Condition mCond, mMainCond;
00079 
00080                 bool mThreadsDone;
00081                 unsigned mWorkingThreads;
00082 
00083                 void threadFunction ();
00084                 static void *threadEntry (void *queue);
00085         public:
00088                 ThreadedJobQueue (size_t numberOfThreads);
00090                 virtual void executeJobs ();
00092                 virtual void addJob (Job *job);
00094                 virtual ~ThreadedJobQueue ();
00095 };
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 };
00099 };
00100 
00101 #endif // NOISEJOBQUEUE_H
